text: The application for a manager's license shall include:
historical:
D.C. Law 13-298 amended and enacted into law Title 25 of the District of Columbia Official Code.

Prior Codifications

For D.C. Law 13-298, see notes following § 25-101.

Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 15-187, in pars. (1) and (2), made nonsubstantive changes; and added par. (3).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 15-187, see notes following § 25-101.

DC CODE § 25-410

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Certification that he or she has obtained read a copy of this title;
Written statements or evidence establishing to the satisfaction of the Board that the applicant meets all of the qualifications set forth in § 25- 301; and
A copy of the applicant's alcohol training and education certificate.
